p: LSPM has consulted for DNAelectronics (2015-18), Dairy Crest (2017–2018), Umovis Lab (2020), bioMerieux (2013-2020), received speaker fees from Profile Pharma (2018) and Pfizer (2018-2020), received research grants from the National Institute for Health Research (2013-2020), CW+ Charity (2018-2020), and Leo Pharma (2016), and received educational support from Eumedica (2016–2018).
